Very good!
This app's sound doesn't work for us. We have a Samsung Galaxy Tab 4. It' such a shame because my 3yo son loves the app, but keeps asking for the sound!

After he filled the truck at the digger the truck won't move forward. All the other ways of filling up the truck worked fine. Once I installed it a second time it worked. He loves it and I don't have to stand over him worrying about ads.

This has literally been one of the very few games on here that keeps my 3 year old boy occupied for longer than a few seconds! I had to bribe him to quit playing, ha! The other game of yours he enjoys playing is Toca Boo, he will play that for an extended amount of time. I am very impressed with this developer! Bravo!!!
My son loves this game but it keeps blacking out on him.  He gets all upset. This is frustrating.

I always love the SAGO games. They are well thought and made and they can be played by everyone. They have a lot of features that keep you interested and a lot of small fun surprises that keep children engaged.  Go ahead and buy it if your child loves vehicles or trucks.
